snippet: The authorities in Williston, N.D., say that crimes against women have increased in this area, where single men greatly outnumber single women.
abstract: Authorities in Williston, ND, say harassment and crimes against women have increased in the area, where young single men greatly outnumber single women; many women say they feel unsafe around the men, who are working labor-intensive, high-paying oil boom jobs; North Dakota has become state with the third-highest ration of single young men to single young women in the country.
lead_paragraph: The authorities in Williston, N.D., say that crimes against women have increased in this area, where single men greatly outnumber single women.

headline.seo: An Oil Town Where Men Are Many, and Women Are Hounded
headline.main: An Oil Town Where Men Are Many, and Women Are Hounded
headline.print_headline: An Oil Town Where Men Are Many, and Women Are Hounded
